rows.name: text_1
rows.value: A teen sometimes does something because they:

rows.name: text_2
rows.value:
- Listen to their friends
- Want to do what others do
- Think more about ‘now’ than ‘later’
- Love impulses and can find being careful boring
- Do not worry about risk – may even like risks
- Have limited experience to rely on
- Are willing to try something – no matter what happens

rows.name: text_3
rows.value: It can help to keep this in mind when your teen makes a wrong decision. Talk to them and spend time together so you can help them choose better next time!
